awd_titl_txt: Patenting Trends in the United States and Other Countries - 1987
awd_abstract_narration: This project will continue and update a series of data                  about patents granted by the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office.                  Patents from 1963 through 1987 will be classified by year of                    grant and year of application, nationality of inventor, sector of               assigned owner, and field of technology in terms of the Standard                Industrial Classification.  Separate data will be tabulated for                 patents owned by universities and colleges, patents owned by                    Government agencies, and patents in narrow technology fields of                 special interest.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
org_div_long_name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics.
